Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor homers to end Bowden Francis' no-hit bid in the 9th
The Mets' 6 runs in the 9th were the most by a team that had no hits through 8 frames in the expansion era (since 1961)
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bowden Francis flirted with a no-hitter vs. Mets
Sean Manaea tips his cap to Bowden Francis
Others: Bowden Francis became the 1st pitcher since Nolan Ryan in 1989 to lose 2 no-hit bids in the 9th in the same season
Measuring the stats on Francisco Alvarez's home run
